mainPage.title: AI Design
mainPage.description: A component library for common application scenarios.
mainPage.privacyNotice: This application is for demonstration purposes only and does not collect personal information.

basicComponentsPage.title: Basic Components
basicComponentsPage.floatingButtonDescription: A button that floats above the content.

navigationComponentsPage.title: Navigation Components
navigationComponentsPage.appHeaderDescription: Scroll down to see the effect

inputComponentsPage.title: Input Components
inputComponentsPage.checkboxLabel: I agree to the terms and conditions
inputComponentsPage.fileUploaderLabel: Drag & drop files here or click to select

dataDisplayComponentsPage.title: Data Display
dataDisplayComponentsPage.comingSoon: More components are on the way, stay tuned!

cardComponentsPage.title: Card Components
cardComponentsPage.appCardDescription: A versatile card for general content, used throughout the application.
cardComponentsPage.chartCardDescription: A card specifically designed to contain charts and data visualizations.
cardComponentsPage.imageCardFullBleedDescription: An image that fills the entire card content area.
cardComponentsPage.imageCardWithBorderDescription: An image card with a distinct border around the image.
cardComponentsPage.imageCardWithOverlayTitleDescription: A card where the title is displayed directly on top of the image.
cardComponentsPage.imageCardWithTitleBelowDescription: A common pattern with the image on top and descriptive text underneath.
cardComponentsPage.imageCardWithButtonDescription: An image card that includes a call-to-action button.
cardComponentsPage.imageCardLeftContentRightDescription: A layout with an image on the left and text on the right.
cardComponentsPage.tagCardDescription: A card for displaying a collection of tags or keywords.
cardComponentsPage.educationCardCourseOverviewDescription: A card to display key information about a course, including instructor, lessons, and price.
cardComponentsPage.educationCardLessonProgressDescription: Shows a user's progress in a specific course.
cardComponentsPage.educationCardInstructorProfileDescriptio: A card to introduce a course instructor.
cardComponentsPage.instructorProfileBio: Pioneering researcher in computational linguistics and AI ethics.
cardComponentsPage.educationCardCertificateDescription: A card representing a user's earned certificate.
cardComponentsPage.educationCardUpcomingLiveDescription: Notifies users of an upcoming live class with a countdown.
cardComponentsPage.upcomingLiveTitle: Live Q&A: The Future of AI
cardComponentsPage.courseOutlineDescription: A hierarchical list that allows users to expand and collapse course sections.
cardComponentsPage.ecommerceProductGridDescription: For compactly displaying products in a grid layout.
cardComponentsPage.ecommerceProductListDescription: For displaying products in a list view, providing more space for information.
cardComponentsPage.ecommerceCartItemDescription: Represents a single item in the shopping cart, with quantity controls.
cardComponentsPage.ecommerceOrderSummaryDescription: Summarizes cart totals and leads to checkout.
cardComponentsPage.ecommercePromotionDescription: Highlights special offers with a countdown and eye-catching design.
cardComponentsPage.productDescription: Next-gen wearable with integrated AI assistant and holographic display.
cardComponentsPage.promoSubtitle: Up to 50% off on select tech gadgets
cardComponentsPage.ecommerceCategoryDescription: Visually appealing cards to guide users to product categories.
cardComponentsPage.ecommerceReviewDescription: Display user feedback and ratings to build trust.
cardComponentsPage.ecommerceShippingDescription: Allow users to select their preferred shipping method.
cardComponentsPage.reviewContent: This smart watch exceeded my expectations! The battery life is amazing and the screen is so crisp. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a high-end wearable.

feedbackComponentsPage.title: Feedback
feedbackComponentsPage.comingSoon: More components are on the way, stay tuned!

faq.question: How do I reset my password?
faq.answer: You can reset your password by going to the settings page and clicking on 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions sent to your email.

faq.question: Where can I find my billing information?
faq.answer: Billing information is available in the 'Billing' section of your account settings. You can view past invoices and update your payment method there.

faq.question: How do I contact customer support?
faq.answer: You can contact our support team through the 'Customer Service' link on your profile page or by emailing support@ipollo.com.

faq.question: Is my data secure?
faq.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security practices to protect your data. For more details, please review our privacy policy.

chatPage.title: AI Chat
chatPage.initialMessage: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. How can I help you today?
